front.title: Traffic Selector for Internet Key Exchange version 2 to add support Differentiated Services Field Codepoints (DSCP)

abstract.t: Agreeing on SA with specific Differentiated Services Field Codepoints (DSCP) is not possible today as traffic selector does not consider DSCP. This document enables to further specify DSCP the current traffic selectors with a new Traffic Selector Type. The Traffic Selector Type can only be used in tunnel mode.
